data.name: customSqlQuery1.Sql
data.value:
SELECT H.EmpCode,H.Description,H.EmpName,SP.Sex,HP.SecDescription AS KHPost,HD.SecDescription AS KHDEPT,dbo.getDateKH(H.FromDate) AS FromDate, dbo.getDateKH(H.ToDate) AS ToDate,dbo.getDateKH(Sp.StartDate) AS StartDate,dbo.getDateKH(H.CreatedOn) AS ReqDate,COM.Images,H.DocNo AS RefNo, CONVERT(VARCHAR(4), H.CreatedOn, 112) AS RequestYear,HS.SecDescription AS SectKH,SP.Signature,SP.OthAllName,dbo.getDateKH(GETDATE()) DateNow, (SELECT TOP 1 StampRejectImage FROM SYHRSetting)RejectImage, (CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(EX.Approver) FROM ExDocApproval EX WHERE EX.DocumentNo=H.DocNo AND EX.DocumentType=H.DocType AND Ex.ApproveLevel in(@APROLEVEL+1))>0THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)N_A, (SELECT TOP 1 EX.Status FROM ExDocApproval EX WHERE EX.DocumentNo=H.DocNo AND EX.DocumentType=H.DocType AND Ex.ApproveLevel IN(CASE WHEN @APROLEVEL in(1,2,3,4) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END))Status1, (SELECT TOP 1 EX.Status FROM ExDocApproval EX WHERE EX.DocumentNo=H.DocNo AND EX.DocumentType=H.DocType AND Ex.ApproveLevel IN(CASE WHEN @APROLEVEL in(2,3,4) THEN 2 ELSE 0 END))Status2, (SELECT TOP 1 EX.Status FROM ExDocApproval EX WHERE EX.DocumentNo=H.DocNo AND EX.DocumentType=H.DocType AND Ex.ApproveLevel IN(CASE WHEN @APROLEVEL in(3,4) THEN 3 ELSE 0 END))Status3, (SELECT TOP 1 EX.Status FROM ExDocApproval EX WHERE EX.DocumentNo=H.DocNo AND EX.DocumentType=H.DocType AND Ex.ApproveLevel IN(CASE WHEN @APROLEVEL in(4) THEN 4 ELSE 0 END))Status4,
dbo.getDateKH((SELECT TOP 1 EX.ApprovedDate FROM ExDocApproval EX WHERE EX.DocumentNo=H.DocNo AND EX.DocumentType=H.DocType AND Ex.ApproveLevel IN(CASE WHEN @APROLEVEL in(1,2,3,4) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)))ApprovedDate1, dbo.getDateKH((SELECT TOP 1 EX.ApprovedDate FROM ExDocApproval EX WHERE EX.DocumentNo=H.DocNo AND EX.DocumentType=H.DocType AND Ex.ApproveLevel IN(CASE WHEN @APROLEVEL in(2,3,4) THEN 2 ELSE 0 END)))ApprovedDate2, dbo.getDateKH((SELECT TOP 1 EX.ApprovedDate FROM ExDocApproval EX WHERE EX.DocumentNo=H.DocNo AND EX.DocumentType=H.DocType AND Ex.ApproveLevel IN(CASE WHEN @APROLEVEL in(3,4) THEN 3 ELSE 0 END)))ApprovedDate3, dbo.getDateKH((SELECT TOP 1 EX.ApprovedDate FROM ExDocApproval EX WHERE EX.DocumentNo=H.DocNo AND EX.DocumentType=H.DocType AND Ex.ApproveLevel IN(CASE WHEN @APROLEVEL in(4) THEN 4 ELSE 0 END)))ApprovedDate4,
(SELECT TOP 1 M.OthAllName FROM HRStaffProfile M WHERE M.EmpCode IN(SELECT TOP 1 EX.Approver FROM ExDocApproval EX WHERE EX.DocumentNo=H.DocNo AND EX.DocumentType=H.DocType AND Ex.ApproveLevel IN(CASE WHEN @APROLEVEL in(1,2,3,4) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)))ApproverName1, (SELECT TOP 1 M.OthAllName FROM HRStaffProfile M WHERE M.EmpCode IN(SELECT TOP 1 EX.Approver FROM ExDocApproval EX WHERE EX.DocumentNo=H.DocNo AND EX.DocumentType=H.DocType AND Ex.ApproveLevel IN(CASE WHEN @APROLEVEL in(2,3,4) THEN 2 ELSE 0 END)))ApproverName2, (SELECT TOP 1 M.OthAllName FROM HRStaffProfile M WHERE M.EmpCode IN(SELECT TOP 1 EX.Approver FROM ExDocApproval EX WHERE EX.DocumentNo=H.DocNo AND EX.DocumentType=H.DocType AND Ex.ApproveLevel IN(CASE WHEN @APROLEVEL in(3,4) THEN 3 ELSE 0 END)))ApproverName3, (SELECT TOP 1 M.OthAllName FROM HRStaffProfile M WHERE M.EmpCode IN(SELECT TOP 1 EX.Approver FROM ExDocApproval EX WHERE EX.DocumentNo=H.DocNo AND EX.DocumentType=H.DocType AND Ex.ApproveLevel IN(CASE WHEN @APROLEVEL in(4) THEN 4 ELSE 0 END)))ApproverName4,
(SELECT TOP 1 M.Signature FROM HRStaffProfile M WHERE M.EmpCode IN(SELECT TOP 1 EX.Approver FROM ExDocApproval EX WHERE EX.DocumentNo=H.DocNo AND EX.DocumentType=H.DocType AND Ex.ApproveLevel IN(CASE WHEN @APROLEVEL in(1,2,3,4) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)))sign1, (SELECT TOP 1 M.Signature FROM HRStaffProfile M WHERE M.EmpCode IN(SELECT TOP 1 EX.Approver FROM ExDocApproval EX WHERE EX.DocumentNo=H.DocNo AND EX.DocumentType=H.DocType AND Ex.ApproveLevel IN(CASE WHEN @APROLEVEL in(2,3,4) THEN 2 ELSE 0 END)))sign2, (SELECT TOP 1 M.Signature FROM HRStaffProfile M WHERE M.EmpCode IN(SELECT TOP 1 EX.Approver FROM ExDocApproval EX WHERE EX.DocumentNo=H.DocNo AND EX.DocumentType=H.DocType AND Ex.ApproveLevel IN(CASE WHEN @APROLEVEL in(3,4) THEN 3 ELSE 0 END)))sign3, (SELECT TOP 1 M.Signature FROM HRStaffProfile M WHERE M.EmpCode IN(SELECT TOP 1 EX.Approver FROM ExDocApproval EX WHERE EX.DocumentNo=H.DocNo AND EX.DocumentType=H.DocType AND Ex.ApproveLevel IN(CASE WHEN @APROLEVEL in(4) THEN 4 ELSE 0 END)))sign4 FROM HREFLeave H LEFT JOIN HRStaffProfile SP ON SP.EmpCode = H.CreatedBy LEFT JOIN HRDepartment HD ON HD.Code = H.Department LEFT JOIN HRSection HS ON HS.Code = H.Section LEFT JOIN HRPosition HP ON HP.Code = H.Position left join HRCompany COM on SP.CompanyCode=COM.Company WHERE H.DocNo= @DocNo;
